div.p: When you click on a chart or table that is running a real-time search, you create a snapshot of the equivalent absolute timerange at that moment. The drilldown searches over that absolute timerange for the sourcetype that you clicked on.
Here is the panel implementing the real-time drilldown.
div.div:
<chart>
<searchString>* | top sourcetype | fields - percent</searchString>
<title>live events, last 30 seconds, by sourcetype</title>
<earliestTime>rt-30s</earliestTime>
<latestTime>rt</latestTime>
<option name="drilldown">all</option>
<option name="charting.chart">bar</option>
</chart>
